actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To amend the Impact Aid program to provide for computation of payments to local educational agencies under that program based on eligible federally connected children living in military housing constructed pursuant to limited partnerships with private developers.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide for computation of payments to local educational agencies under the Impact Aid program based on eligible federally-connected children living in military housing constructed pursuant to limited partnerships with private developers.

titles.title: To amend the Impact Aid program to provide for computation of payments to local educational agencies under that program based on eligible federally connected children living in military housing constructed pursuant to limited partnerships with private developers.
